title: NO SLEEP NEEDED
explanation: In the bustling city that never rests, a group of individuals embarks on a remarkable journey. They have discovered a secret that defies the limits of human endurance: a way to function without sleep. As their lives intertwine and their abilities astonish the world, questions arise about the price they might pay for their newfound power. Join us on an exhilarating exploration of boundaries, sacrifices, and the uncharted territories of the human body and mind.
